pageProduct.name: QV Wash Cleansing Bar 100G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The smart alternative to soap. Looks like soap. Feels like soap. But it’s not soap. It’s a soap free cleansing bar. QV Bar is enriched with moisturisers, and will leave your skin feeling soft and smooth.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes, if lather enters eyes, wash out immediately with water.  For external use only. Store below 30°C.
Always read the label. Use only as directed.
If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Maintains skin’s natural protective properties and doesn’t strip away natural oils like soap can.
• pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.
• Suitable for even sensitive skin types.
• Particularly suitable for infants and the elderly.

Ingredients

• Maintains skin’s natural protective properties and doesn’t strip away natural oils like soap can.
• pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.
• Suitable for even sensitive skin types.
• Particularly suitable for infants and the elderly.

Directions

Wet skin, apply QV Bar to desired area. Rinse, pat skin gently dry. Do not use soap. Keep bar dry for prolonged usage.
